story_28_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ugh... All right, all right! We surrender!
story_28_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hmph. So you’ve finally accepted your fate.
story_28_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: That’s it! We’ve finally crushed all of Team Break!
story_28_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: We sure did! And not only that...
story_28_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We teamed up with LEAR of all people in the
final battle!
story_28_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Hmph. I could easily have defeated those fools
on my own if I’d wanted to.
story_28_06000/2401_0401_0900_10:
Sh-shut up! I only teamed up with you to hurry
along the process!
story_28_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Those Team Break losers were sooooo annoying.
I’m super glad they’re, like, finally gonna be out
of our hair.
story_28_06000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Looks like we’ve officially gotten rid of Pasio’s
biggest headache.
story_28_06000/2401_1201_1700_10:
Rachel. Sawyer. Round up all the Team Break
members we captured and bring them to me.
